trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.

This is the menu item that appears when you long press the Focus icon on the phone home screen.
Title of the Erase intent.

trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.

trans-unit.target: Firefox アプリを入手する
trans-unit.note: Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Firefox but doesn’t have it installed. This string will not wrap in the interface. Instead, it will truncate. To prevent this, please keep the localized string to 18 or fewer characters. If your string runs longer than 18 characters, you can use 'Get Firefox' as the basis for your string. However, if at all possible, we’d like to signal to the user that they will be going to the App Store and installing the application from there. That is why we are using Get and App in the en-US string.

trans-unit.target: 設定を開いて特定のプライバシーとセキュリティの設定を管理します。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Context Menu icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: These default settings offer strong protection. But it’s easy to tweak the settings to meet your specific needs.
trans-unit.target: これらのデフォルト設定は強力な保護を提供します。必要に応じて、簡単に設定を調整できます。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: %@ stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield for info on what we blocked.
trans-unit.target: %@ がこのサイトによるスパイ行動を阻止しました。ブロックしたものに関する情報を見るには盾アイコンをタップしてください。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip. Where placeholder can be (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.source: Tap the trash anytime to remove all traces of your current session.
trans-unit.target: ゴミ箱をタップするだけで、いつでも現在のセッションの痕跡をすべて削除します。
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Trash icon tooltip
This is the title text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.target: 自動補完にリンクを追加
trans-unit.note: Label displayed for button used as a shortcut to add a link to the list of URLs to autocomplete.
Label for cancel button shown when entering a URL or search
Text for the URL context menu when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.
Erase button in the URL bar

trans-unit.target: ブラウジング履歴を消去しました
trans-unit.note: Message shown after pressing the Erase button
Label displayed for find in page button when typing in the URL Bar. %@ is any text the user has typed into the URL bar that they want to find on the current page.
Text for a menu displayed from the bottom of the screen when a user long presses on the URL bar with clipboard contents.

trans-unit.target: 検索語またはアドレスを入力
trans-unit.note: Placeholder text shown in the URL bar before the user navigates to a page
Label displayed for search button when typing in the URL bar
Text for the URL bar showing the number of trackers blocked on a webpage.
Title for action sheet item to open the current page in another application. Placeholder is the name of the application to open the current page.

trans-unit.target: URL をクリップボードにコピーしました
trans-unit.note: Toast displayed after a URL has been copied to the clipboard

trans-unit.target: ロケーションバーを選択
trans-unit.note: Label to display in the Discoverability overlay for keyboard shortcuts
Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy an image after long pressing it.

trans-unit.target: リンクアドレスをコピー
trans-unit.note: Text for the context menu when a user wants to copy a link after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user has a link on their clipboard.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to save an image after long pressing it.
Text for the context menu when a user wants to share a link after long pressing it.

trans-unit.target: %1$@ が %2$@ を開こうとしています
trans-unit.note: Dialog title used for opening an external app from Focus. First placeholder string is the app name of either Focus or Klar and the second placeholder string specifies the app it wants to open.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save images to your Camera Roll
trans-unit.target: これにより画像をカメラロールに保存できるようになります
trans-unit.note: Description for dialog used for requesting a user to enable access to Photos.
Title for button that takes the user to system settings

trans-unit.source: “%@” Would Like to Access Your Photos
trans-unit.target: 「%@」が写真へのアクセスを求めています
trans-unit.note: Dialog title used for requesting a user to enable access to Photos. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
Text displayed as an example of the template to add a search engine.
Text for a share button
Text for the share menu when a user wants to copy a URL.

trans-unit.source: Use Touch ID to return to %@
trans-unit.target: Touch ID を使って %@ へ戻る
trans-unit.note: %@ is app name. Prompt shown to ask the user to use Touch ID to continue browsing after returning to the app.
Label for ad trackers.
label for analytic trackers.

trans-unit.target: 接続は安全ではありません
trans-unit.note: Text for tracking protection screen showing the connection is not secure
Text for tracking protection screen showing the connection is secure
String to let users know the site verifier, where the placeholder represents the SSL certificate signer.
label for content trackers.

trans-unit.target: トラッキング防止はオフです
trans-unit.note: text showing the tracking protection is disabled.
Title for the tracking settings page to change what trackers are blocked.

trans-unit.source: Turning this off may fix some site problems
trans-unit.target: この設定をオフにすると、一部のサイトの問題が解決する可能性があります
trans-unit.note: Description/subtitle for the tracking protection label.
Text for the button to learn more about Tracking Protection.
Text for the button that closes the Shield Data and opens the regular Settings screen.
label for social trackers.

trans-unit.source: Protections are OFF for this session
trans-unit.target: このセッションでは保護が無効になっています
trans-unit.note: Text for the status off from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.source: Protections are ON for this session
trans-unit.target: このセッションでは保護が有効になっています
trans-unit.note: Text for the status on from Tracking Protection.

trans-unit.source: Disable until you close %@ or tap ERASE.
trans-unit.target: %@ を閉じるまで無効化するか「消去」をタップしてください。
trans-unit.note: Description for the tracking protection toggle. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar

trans-unit.target: 強化型トラッキング防止機能
trans-unit.note: Text for the toggle that enables/disables tracking protection.

trans-unit.source: Keep your data to yourself. %@ protects you from many of the most common trackers that follow what you do online.
trans-unit.target: 個人データの収集を防止します。%@ はオンラインでのあなたの行動を追跡するよく知られた数多くのトラッカーからあなたを守ります。
trans-unit.note: General description of tracking protection settings, which is displayed underneath the trackers preferences in Settings. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar

trans-unit.target: %@ 以降トラッカーがブロックされました
trans-unit.note: Text for tracking protection screen showing the number of trackers blocked since the app install. The placeholder is replaced with the install date of the application.

trans-unit.target: ブロックするトラッカーとスクリプト
trans-unit.note: Text for the header of trackers section from Tracking Protection.
The title of the Licenses setting in the settings that Focus shows in the global iOS Settings app.
